mapper.sql: C.content_seq, C.video_id, C.url, C.title, C.description, C.category, C.thumbnail_url, C.duration, C.process_status, C.indate, C.completed_at, C.delete_yn, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(tag SEPARATOR ',') FROM fb_ai_content_tags WHERE content_seq = C.content_seq) AS tags
mapper.select: SELECT , COUNT(T2.content_tag_seq) AS match_count FROM fb_ai_contents C INNER JOIN fb_ai_content_tags T ON C.content_seq = T.content_seq INNER JOIN fb_ai_user_contents UC ON UC.user_content_seq = #{userContentSeq} INNER JOIN fb_ai_content_tags T2 ON T.tag = T2.tag AND T2.content_seq = UC.content_seq WHERE C.delete_yn = 'N' AND C.content_seq != UC.content_seq GROUP BY C.content_seq ORDER BY match_count DESC, C.indate DESC LIMIT 6
